browser_snapshot.preservation_instruction: Preserve all clickable elements, form inputs, navigation links, and interactive elements. Include element selectors and descriptions needed for browser automation.

browser_navigate.preservation_instruction: Preserve page title, main navigation elements, key content sections, and any error messages or status indicators.

browser_evaluate.preservation_instruction: Preserve JavaScript execution results, error messages, and any data structures returned by the evaluation.

browser_network_requests.preservation_instruction: Preserve request/response status codes, key headers, error messages, and essential response data. Compress verbose JSON responses while keeping structure.

browser_take_screenshot.preservation_instruction: Describe visible interactive elements, their locations, and any text or buttons that could be clicked or interacted with.

browser_click.preservation_instruction: Preserve click results, any page changes, error messages, navigation that occurred, and current page state after the click. Include any new elements that appeared or disappeared.
